directions: Stir together goat cheese and pepper with a fork. Spread butter on cut sides of rolls. Make sandwiches with rolls, peppered goat cheese, figs, prosciutto, and arugula.
ingredients: 6 oz soft mild goat cheese (3/4 cup) at room temperature
6 (4- to 5-inch) soft round seeded rolls, split
6 fresh figs, trimmed and sliced lengthwise 1/4inch thick
title: Prosciutto, Goat Cheese, and Fig Sandwiches
